Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! 🍵

@Ovilia 

textStyle
Global font style.
https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#textStyle

For example:
textStyle.fontFamily = 'Avenir Next'

besides just
'serif' , 'monospace', ...

Any custom font we may want to include in the page, can Echarts expand to support it? Can we point ECharts to the font we include? Any of the sort besides just a set list of fonts. Not sure what more of an explanation can be given. The ability to use any custom font we want to use besides the defaults.
@Ovilia because of that, this issue was marked as "new-feature" and not a "support" question. May you could add the "new-feature" label again? In my opinion this is a missing feature.

Thanks for your contribution!
The community will review it ASAP. In the meanwhile, please checkout [the coding standard](https://echarts.apache.org/en/coding-standard.html) and Wiki about [How to make a pull request](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/wiki/How-to-make-a-pull-request).
It seems to be a bug brought by #11743 and should will be fixed soon.

既然数据一样，显示的折线当然应该叠在一起的，不然就是误导。不确定这么做的目的是什么？如果只是为了看清有两个系列的话，似乎有点舍本求末。
比如是否可以用 `areaStyle` 为每个系列增加一个半透明比较淡的背景色，比如系列颜色是红色和黄色的，那么叠加后背景色是橙色的，用户能在一定程度上知道这是两个系列叠在一起的效果。
如果实在非要用偏移来解决问题，那么你可以自己判断一下数据，如果数据完全一样，就给其中的一个数据增加一点点值，然后利用 label formatter 和 tooltip formatter 来控制显示的数据仍然等于原来的数据。
不支持这一功能（不同类目下系列的排序不同），暂时也没有计划支持。如果一定需要的话，比较简单的做法是，自己 hack 一下，实际传入的 data 是排好序的不同系列的，并且每个柱子用对应真实的系列颜色设置。
明确一下需求，是希望柱状图最小占画布的 1/4 吗？https://echarts.apache.org/zh/option.html#series-bar.barMinHeight 这个配置项可以设置柱条的最小高度。

Converted to draft, there are still some work to be done.
Related issues #12667, #11743, #12359
@nguyencuongabcxyz Do you mean you wish https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#series-custom.renderItem.return_path.style to support `lineType`?
https://echarts.apache.org/zh/option.html#tooltip.extraCssText 可以设置额外的 CSS，比如在移动端的时候这里设置一个 transform 旋转 90°

I marked this to be a new feature but I don't think we plan to make this new feature recently. Because as I said, the suggested method to do so is to this as the demo does. It's not much a "hack" and it does complete the job without much bother.

> @Ovilia 是的，现在我是通过动态计算坐标来实现了

请问关于计算坐标的算法，您使用的是什么呢？如果不涉及商业秘密，能否给点思路

I try to fix the issue like this too, but i  thought the result seem set the ```height``` but no ```lineHeight```,and i didn't find a good way to solve it.😁

Maybe the label should be centered vertically?

> 后续在5.0版本中有可能会为更多的选项提供function类型的入参。
> 其实很多series都可能需要function类型的参数来实现更多的个性化，如`rotate`, `offset`等等。
> 逐一适配或许会很繁琐，不知道是否会有一种简单统一的方式去实现这些？

很赞同，感觉很多issus都在提要使用function来做个性化配置，统一提供感觉是个好方法，不然配置会不会太麻烦？
其实还是不明白你具体的需求是什么？log 轴可以满足吗？https://echarts.apache.org/zh/option.html#yAxis.type

@wf123537200 bingo，我自己能写一个动态算法解决这个问题，只是解决了我的这个问题，但是框架的这个问题还是存在的，我希望框架能在根本上解决这个问题。(*^▽^*)

@Ovilia 我希望框架能在根本上解决这个问题，而不单是我的问题被解决而已~当前只解决我的问题的话，意味着以后还会出现同样的问题。而每个人都要通过我这个方式去解决的话，这就是动作上的浪费了

In fact, I did a test about this a few days ago and the result is that besides `lineHeight`, there are more properties are invalid for `tooltip.axisPointer.label` such as `width`, `height`,  `textShadowColor`, `textBorderColor`, `textBorderWidth`.
Maybe this PR can continue to finish the  [`TODO: rich` at line 90](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/component/axisPointer/viewHelper.js#L90) to fix them in a row.
@ryantunis  how do you fixed this problem now

pieces应该绘制在淡色的line图，左右95%刻度线外

目前绘制的区域和颜色都有点迷

Reproduced regarding the issue itself.
But suggest to discuss in community to decide about expected behavior as I'm not convinced on setting max of y axis to 1 in such cases.

如果需要在饼图上显示百分比，可以通过tooltip或是label的`formatter`中设置[https://echarts.apache.org/examples/zh/editor.html?c=pie-nest](https://echarts.apache.org/examples/zh/editor.html?c=pie-nest) 

如果仅需要获得百分比以供JS中其他计算使用，可以自己实现。

如果是有其他的需求，请通过[Issue Helper](https://ecomfe.github.io/?lang=zh-cn)提交符合要求的Issue。
真的太慢了
@Ovilia  why do you close this? I think its legitimate issue / feature request. It seems inconsistent if a website is using some fontFamily but using different one for charts.

感谢反馈，有兴趣提个PR修复下吗？
这里对应的项目是：[incubator-echarts-doc](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts-doc)

英文：https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts-doc/blob/master/en/tutorial/dataset.md

Currently, ECharts can not support the feature of multiple tooltips. But maybe it will be supported in 5.0 milestone. Related requirement and implementation is under discussion in issue #11382. Notes that this issue is in Chinese.
@brsdv Thanks for reporting.

@TRSK-CONMI 我没理解这为什么是一个 bug？你所说的数值最大触顶最小值触底为什么不符合预期呢？难道数值 1 对应的高度不就应该是几乎不可见的吗？
业务层面，我可以理解说加一个 minHeight，但是为什么这是 bug？其他场景为什么也同样需要 minHeight 呢？
用的是官方哪个示例？其他手机显示，只有华为不显示吗？

Custom fonts are supported. You should load the fonts with CSS and set [fontFamily](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#textStyle.fontFamily) to the name of those fonts.

@Ejstn The issue was closed because lack of activity (5 month).
I made a demo: https://codepen.io/Ovilia/pen/ExVreNE
This is not a bug but I do think it's useful to make a feature like this. Further discussion required.
For now, @YiYingWu1302 you have to make a fake data with zero values and set axis max value.

Use https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#series-bar.markPoint and set it's data to be the percentage. If you want the shape as in the image, set https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#series-bar.markPoint.symbol to be the SVG path value.
I see, thanks a lot for your reply :)
